item.title: GATK for inbred mouse is not good
item.author: Author
item.description: GATK is design for human genetics, it works not so good on homogeneous inbred mouse. But we could use bcftools instead. One of my colleague who studies mouse genetics, said, I tried the haplotype caller from GATK. But it seems that the haplotype caller is designed for heterogeneous genome like human than for mice.
